section.title: Icinga Packages for &name-linux; Distributions
section.para: Many distributions like &name-debian;, &name-suse; or &name-ubuntu; provide packages for &name-icinga;.

para.emphasis: At this point: a big "thank you" to the many helpers who build packages and bring them to the distributions!

section.para: Here is a list of distributions for which &name-icinga; packages are available:

note.para: Each distribution has its own preferences where the parts of &name-icinga; are installed, so the locations of configuration files, binaries, log files, etc., deviate from the places mentioned throughout this documentation. Sometimes this confuses the users.
